com.aionemu.commons.network
Class AConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.commons.network.AConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
AionConnection, AionConnection, ChatServerConnection, GsConnection, LoginServerConnection
public abstract class AConnection
extends java.lang.Object

Class that represent Connection with server socket. Connection is created by ConnectionFactory and attached to SelectionKey key. Selection key is registered to one of Dispatchers Selector to handle io read and write.

Author:
-Nemesiss-

          True if this connection is already closed.

final void setKey(java.nio.channels.SelectionKey key)
Set selection key - result of registration this AConnection socketChannel to one of dispatchers.

enableWriteInterest

protected final void enableWriteInterest()
Notify Dispatcher Selector that we want write some data here.

getDispatcher

final Dispatcher getDispatcher()
Returns:
Dispatcher to witch this connection is registered.

getSocketChannel

public java.nio.channels.SocketChannel getSocketChannel()
Returns:
SocketChannel representing this connection.

close

public final void close(boolean forced)
Connection will be closed at some time [by Dispatcher Thread], after that onDisconnect() method will be called to clear all other things.

Parameters:
forced - is just hint that getDisconnectionDelay() should return 0 so OnDisconnect() method will be called without any delay.

onlyClose

final boolean onlyClose()
This will only close the connection without taking care of the rest. May be called only by Dispatcher Thread. Returns true if connection was not closed before.

Returns:
true if connection was not closed before.

isPendingClose

final boolean isPendingClose()
Returns:
True if this connection is pendingClose and not closed yet.

isWriteDisabled

protected final boolean isWriteDisabled()
Returns:
True if write to this connection is possible.

getIP

public final java.lang.String getIP()
Returns:
IP address of this Connection.

tryLockConnection

boolean tryLockConnection()
Used only for PacketProcessor synchronization purpose. Return true if locked successful - if wasn't locked before.

Returns:
locked

unlockConnection

void unlockConnection()
Used only for PacketProcessor synchronization purpose. Unlock this connection.

processData

protected abstract boolean processData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
Parameters:
data -
Returns:
True if data was processed correctly, False if some error occurred and connection should be closed NOW.

writeData

protected abstract boolean writeData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
This method will be called by Dispatcher, and will be repeated till return false.

Parameters:
data -
Returns:
True if data was written to buffer, False indicating that there are not any more data to write.

getDisconnectionDelay

protected abstract long getDisconnectionDelay()
This method is called by Dispatcher when connection is ready to be closed.

Returns:
time in ms after witch onDisconnect() method will be called.

onDisconnect

protected abstract void onDisconnect()
This method is called by Dispatcher to inform that this connection was closed and should be cleared. This method is called only once.

onServerClose

protected abstract void onServerClose()
This method is called by NioServer to inform that NioServer is shouting down. This method is called only once.
